1. Set up environment with '...'
2. Run command '....'
3. Process audio file '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- File format: [e.g. MP3, WAV, FLAC]
- File size: [e.g. 5MB]
- Duration: [e.g. 3:45]
- Sample rate: [e.g. 44.1kHz]

- OS: [e.g. macOS, Windows, Linux]
